name: Trucks Jigsaw Puzzle - including Monster Trucks and More
name_original: Trucks Jigsaw Puzzle - including Monster Trucks and More
description:
Do you have a child who just can’t get enough of all things on wheels? If your kids get excited when they see a fire truck zooming along or when you drive by a food truck, this Trucks Jigsaw Puzzle is the perfect game for them!

This fun puzzle game will keep your kids engaged and entertained as they solve colorful truck-themed picture puzzles.

Features:
• Tons of truck choices
• 3 different modes
• Simple, easy-to-use layout
• Helpful hint option
• No ads!

With fun, bright colors and a simple layout, this kid-friendly puzzle game is targeted towards children ages 2-5. You can select between three different modes (small, medium or large pieces), making it easy to choose a puzzle that matches your child’s abilities. Two-year-olds will enjoy solving the large piece puzzles while older kids will like the challenge of solving the puzzles with smaller pieces.

Just in case your child gets stuck on trying to figure out which piece goes where, a simple click on the magnifying glass will provide a helpful hint!

Playing is easy, with the puzzle pieces laid out on either side of the puzzle board. These pieces can be dragged into place with a simple swipe of the finger. The large buttons and easy-to-use dashboard are tailored specifically for kids.

The variety of trucks include: ambulances, fire trucks, delivery trucks, food trucks, monster trucks, and pickup trucks.

Not only are jigsaw puzzles fun but they are great for development in children, including hand-eye coordination, matching, and problem solving skills! This is a great app to keep on your mobile device, whether you are a parent or a caregiver for young children.

Both fun and educational, Truck Jigsaw Puzzles is a great way for kids to pass the time.
Don’t hesitate to download this fun puzzle game today!
